question:
Consider the following sites:
  1. Apatani Cultural Landscape
  2. Thembang Fortified Village
  3. Moidams
Which among the above is / are located in North East India?
explanation:
Government has identified some monuments/ historical sites in North-Eastern States for listing under World Heritage Site. These include:
  1. Apatani Cultural Landscape, Arunachal Pradesh
  2. Moidams – the Mound – Burial system of the Ahom Dynasty, Assam
  3. Namdapha National Park, Arunachal Pradesh
  4. River Island of Majuli in midstream of Brahmaputra River in Assam
  5. Thembang Fortified Village, Arunachal Pradesh (Lok Sabha Questions; March 2015)
